body_html:
We have more walkthroughs planned, but they aren't specifically meant to improve upon camera support themselves.

You've already found #9142, and #8736 is meant to add android.hardware.Camera support for devices with wonky Camera2 behavior (like the Pixel C apparently) -- we just have to find the right discriminating features to make misbehaving devices choose the original API.

body:
We have more walkthroughs planned, but they aren't specifically meant to improve upon camera support themselves.

You've already found #9142, and #8736 is meant to add android.hardware.Camera support for devices with wonky Camera2 behavior (like the Pixel C apparently) -- we just have to find the right discriminating features to make misbehaving devices choose the original API.
